title: Items being disabled, but their lower tier versions still buyable?
body: For example, at the moment, {{item:3092}} is disabled due to a bug. Fair enough. Why are {{item:3303}} and {{item:3098}} still buyable if the item they end up becoming is not? Just seems like it could cause a fair bit of frustration for the less attentive players out there that could easily be saved by simply disabling the other items unique to that build path.

replies.body:
If you are playing someone like Bard who would buy the spellthiefs and never upgrade it, i think its fine.

There are many champions that never upgrade to the full item so makes sense to not disable all of them
